price: Kandi nta n’umwe muri twe (abamalayika) udafite umwanya uzwi (mu ijuru).
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
